title: Does Quick-Step Need to Sideline Tim Merlier in Favor of Remco Evenepoel’s GC Bid at the Tour de France?
content:
Face Off: Evenepoel will make his highly anticipated Tour debut in 2024, but is there enough room inside the team bus to bring a sprinter as well?

Read the full article at Does Quick-Step Need to Sideline Tim Merlier in Favor of Remco Evenepoel’s GC Bid at the Tour de France? on Velo.
